about_me.des: Focus on Java server development. Research algorithm data structure, enterprise search, approval and other business modules. Light host player.

projects.wbg_desc: Mobile integrated office platform, I am mainly responsible for the approval module, search module, I also assisted in the development of the im module, the hrm module, and maintained several other modules.

career.university_desc: I studied at Dalian University of Technology, with a grade point of 3.7 and won the title of outstanding provincial graduate.
career.company_wbg_desc: I mainly develop an approval and search module for an integrated mobile office platform. I am also responsible for the maintenance of other modules such as the IM module.
